title: Watch the Tulsa Tough livestream
content:
Catch all the action from Tulsa Tough this weekend via a free livestream from USACrits.tv. Just click play above.

We’ll drop results from each night’s pro races here throughout the weekend.

Tulsa Tough Blue Dome results

Women Pro/1/2:

1 – SCHNEIDER, Skylar L39ION of Los Angeles in 00:49:23.000
2 – COLES-LYSTER, Maggie DNA Pro Cycling Team
3 – RYAN, Kendall L39ION of Los Angeles
4 – OWEN, Harriet InstaFund Racing
5 – SCHMID, Kaia LUX/sideshow p/b Specialized

Men Pro/1

1 – WILLIAMS, Justin L39ION of Los Angeles in 00:59:58.000
2 – WILLIAMS, Cory L39ION of Los Angeles
3 – ESTEVEZ, Daniel Best Buddies
4 – WILLIAMS, Tyler L39ION of Los Angeles
5 – BASSETTI, Sam Elevate-Webiplex Pro Cycling

For full results click over to the Tulsa Tough results site.
